body: I have been here for 4 years <u>on this account</u> and didn't know that this server was closing until a week ago, brings back all the fun times and how much fun me and my friends had on this server. Just want to thank the owners for making such a great server... not to mention the ping I get on this server I would think it is hosted in my kitchen... Hope times get better for you Austin/Keenan.

title: Good bye Avicus!
